CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 26, 1959, pg. 1, reads: "Kitchen after Arlington Ave. fire...Children left motherless. - Harris Photo." Cutline for related image reads: "Fatal Christmas Fire - Five children of Mrs. Ruby Thomas, 38, of 138 New Arlington Ave., are temporarily housed at the home of an aunt at 619 E. Carson St., following a fire which destroyed their home and burned the mother, Mrs. Thomas, while she was putting away Christmas presents and toys for her children in a cellar washroom Sunday morning. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Burned kitchen from home of Ruby and John Thomas, 138 New Arlington Avenue, South Side
